root: ^That is you, right? Of course it is. I'd recognize that pretty face anywhere.
^I haven't been taken out just yet by a little cough. And I won't! Trust me.
^It's only been a bit rough lately. I can still move around some so that's good.
^I spoke to Miss Clarice recently, she says hi and wishes you well.
^Oh, how kind. I should send you a letter to give her.
^Are you sure you don't want me asking her for any–
^No, no. I won't bother her. Shouldn't risk her getting sick either.
^Don't worry, Marina. I'll get better soon. Just need a little bedrest.
